module.header:
<style>

h3 {
color: orange!important;
}

.message-blue {
position: relative;
    margin-left: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    padding: 0px 10px 15px 5px;
    background-color: #A8DDFD;
    width: 350px;
    height: auto;
    text-align: left;
    font: 400 1em 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    border: 1px solid #97C6E3;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

.message-grey {
    position: relative;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: calc(100% - 400px);
    padding: 5px 10px 15px 5px;
    background-color: #dedede;
    width: 350px;
    height: auto;
    text-align: left;
    font: 400 1em 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    border: 1px solid #dedede;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

.message-content {
    padding: 5px;
    margin: 0;
    line-height: 20px;
    font-size: 1.1em;
}

.message-timestamp-right {
    position: absolute;
    font-size: .90em;
    font-weight: 300;
    bottom: 5px;
    right: 15px;
    letter-spacing: .1em;
}

.message-timestamp-left {
    position: absolute;
    font-size: .90em;
    font-weight: 300;
    bottom: 5px;
    right: 15px;
    letter-spacing: .1em;
}

.message-blue:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-top: 15px solid #A8DDFD;
    border-left: 15px solid transparent;
    border-right: 15px solid transparent;
    top: 0;
    left: -15px;
}

.message-blue:before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-top: 17px solid #97C6E3;
    border-left: 16px solid transparent;
    border-right: 16px solid transparent;
    top: -1px;
    left: -17px;
}

.message-grey:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-bottom: 15px solid #dedede;
    border-left: 15px solid transparent;
    border-right: 15px solid transparent;
    bottom: 0;
    right: -15px;
}

.message-grey:before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-bottom: 17px solid #dedede;
    border-left: 16px solid transparent;
    border-right: 16px solid transparent;
    bottom: -1px;
    right: -17px;
}

.bstrap30 .input-group[class*=col-] {
 
    max-width: 30%;
    margin-top: 25px;
    margin-left: 520px;
}

.btnReport {
    margin: -60px 20px 0px 0px!important;
    
}

thead.ng-scope {
    font-size: 125%!important;
    color: steelblue!important;
}

.bstrap30 .table-responsive {
    overflow: hidden!important;
}



</style>
module.title: Text Messages Grid
